alert.note: Alert for Carquinez Strait and Delta; Central Sacramento Valley; Northern Sacramento Valley; Northern San Joaquin Valley; Southern Sacramento Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 15 at 1:45AM PST until December 15 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...Gusty Southerly Winds to Impact the Valley Today... .Southerly winds will increase across interior northern California during the morning hours as another storm system impacts the region. Strong winds may down weakened branches or trees, and cause local power outages. Driving could be difficult for high- profile vehicles, especially on east-west oriented roadways. Winds will decrease in the late evening hours. ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...South/southeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. Local gusts up to 50 mph possible. * WHERE...Portions of the Sacramento Valley and the northern San Joaquin Valley. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects and holiday decorations. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few local power outages may result. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
